text: My 9 month old can go at these little guys forever. We have one set for bath time and one set for playtime. He absolutely loves lining up his "guys" and then chewing the life out of each one in turn. These were an absolute godsend when he was teething. The hard ridges on the bumpy sheep were one of the few things that made him feel better. That bumpy sheep saved our sanity! We brought these with us when we visited family and their 2 year old liked them so much we bought her a set too! One word of caution, if you use them in the bath they should probably be replaced every so often. After a while, toys like this can often develop mold on the inside.  That's an issue if your child spends all day happily shoving them in his mouth :)Great toy!
